mapper.insert: insert into todolist(tlno, content, state, tldate, tdno, id) values (todolist_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{state}, sysdate,#{tdno}, #{id})
mapper.update: update todolist set content= #{content}, state=#{state},tdno=#{tdno}, id=#{id} where tlno=#{tlno}
mapper.select: select content,state,tldate,tdno from todolist where tlno =#{value}
